law.catch_line: An educational institution that seeks to qualify as a State-aided educational institution for fundin...
law.text:
An educational institution that seeks to qualify as a State-aided educational institution for funding in the fiscal year following the upcoming fiscal year shall submit before May 1 to the Maryland State Department of Education:
An augmentation request describing:
Who will be served;
The objectives of the educational program; and
The anticipated outcomes;
An application for qualification as a State-aided educational institution; and
Supporting documentation as described in § 5-501 of this subtitle.
